name: Rakun Pinyon - Proof of Concept
description:
This is just a first level. It is a WIP and I don't know where I will go with this if anywhere. For now I just want people to take a look and let me know if the basic concept has any potential.

It's basically an escort mission (which I know everyone loves, right?). 

You can get hurt but the NPC is more or less invulnerable. The goal is to lead him to the exit while grabbing the keys to open doors that block the way. Also, there are a couple of giant spiders.

Anyway.  This is my first attempt at really making a game.
